Hero.title: A Steady Stream of Targeted Clients from Google Ads
Hero.subtitle: I set up profitable ad campaigns. Stop wasting budget on empty clicks—get transparent analytics, lower cost-per-lead, and measurable sales growth.

setup.title: Setup From Scratch
setup.desc: Creation of effective campaigns to attract new clients from day one.

local.title: Google Maps Ads
local.desc: Attracting potential clients dynamically mapping to your physical business radius.

case_1.title: Freight Transport in Kyiv
case_1.desc: Setup from scratch. Leads started coming in the first week. Connected tagmanager, GA, ringostat. Client got max promo code of 30,000 UAH.

case_2.title: MRI Clinic in Kyiv
case_2.desc: Audit, setup of analytics and call tracking. Account restructuring. Working together into the second year.

case_3.title: Flower Shop in Odesa
case_3.desc: Google Maps Ads (2km radius). Generated steady visitor map-actions. Client received a 10,000 UAH GA promo code.

case_4.title: Nail Studio in Copenhagen
case_4.desc: Client from Ukraine opened a salon in Denmark. After an audit and proper setup, started getting steady leads.

q1.question: Do you offer guarantees on the number of leads or sales?
q1.answer: I am honest with my clients: no professional can guarantee an exact number of leads because conversions are influenced by your product, pricing, sales team, and competitors. However, I guarantee that you will receive highly targeted traffic at the best possible price, without wasting your budget on bots or irrelevant searches.

q2.question: What is the recommended advertising budget to start?
q2.answer: This heavily depends on your niche and region. On average, to properly test hypotheses and allow Google's algorithms to learn, a budget of $20-30 per day is needed. If the budget is too small, the campaigns simply won't gain traction.

q3.question: How soon will I get my first clients?
q3.answer: With Search Ads, you can get your first clicks and potential leads within 24-48 hours after passing moderation. However, fully 'training' smart campaigns like Performance Max usually takes about 14-30 days.

q4.question: Do you also configure analytics (GA4) or only the ads?
q4.answer: High-quality advertising is impossible without accurate analytics. I set up the entire ecosystem from scratch: Google Analytics 4, Google Tag Manager, and proper tracking of all macro and micro-conversions.

q5.question: I tried running Google Ads myself and it didn't work. Why will it be different with you?
q5.answer: Google Ads is highly complex today. The 'default' settings are designed so you spend more money. I use negative keyword lists, strictly filter search terms, turn off underperforming networks, and write compelling ad copy based on your customers' actual pain points.
